title: The Daily Show's Bracket of Bulls**t - Pandemic Edition | Arsenio Hall
itunes:title: The Daily Show's Bracket of Bulls**t - Pandemic Edition | Arsenio Hall
description:
Trevor reports on COVID-19 concerns from around the world, Michael Kosta and Roy Wood Jr. introduce the Bracket of Bulls**t: Pandemic Edition, and Arsenio Hall discusses "Coming 2 America."


In honor of Women's History Month, help level the playing field for girls of color in STEM by donating at dailyshow.com/BlackGirlsCode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
